titles.title: A bill to require the Director of the Government Publishing Office to establish and maintain a website accessible to the public that allows the public to obtain electronic copies of all congressionally mandated reports in one place, and for other purposes.
Access to Congressionally Mandated Reports Act
Access to Congressionally Mandated Reports Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson with an amendment. With written report No. 116-31.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 67.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
